entry.value: Joiner 4:1716:0:1527: Cannot reuse input row keys for output. When putting left and right unmatched rows in the same table, the row keys might not be unique.

Performs batch correction using the ComBat algorithm from the R package sva (version 3.44.0). Experimental design as well as batch design need to be provided in the input form.%%00010%%00010Please note that the metanode can fail in certain configurations of missing values. For that purpose, it is possible to impute the missing values within this metanode using a simple imputation method. If a more advanced imputation method is required, it should be performed prior to running this metanode.%%00010 %%00010Apart from corrected data, the metanode also returns visualizations of sources of variability and UMAP projection for data before and after batch correction.%%00010%%00010================= %%00010%%00010Used programs and tools and their respective licenses at the time of the metanode creation. Version numbers and the licenses might differ based on your local installation. Please inspect your local installation and contact us if you can not locate your local version and or license terms. %%00010%%00010Python 3 (The Python consists of the following Python 3.10 License. Licence terms are available here: https://docs.python.org/3/license.html) %%00010%%00010R (The R programming language consists of the following GNU General Public Licenses. License terms are available here: https://www.r-project.org/Licenses/) %%00010%%00010KNIME nodes (The KNIME nodes consists of the following GNU GPL 3.0 License. Licence terms are available here: https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html) %%00010%%00010The metanode was created in KNIME 4.5.2 running inside the docker image (https://hub.docker.com/r/cfprot/knime/), tag 4.5.2a. %%00010%%00010================= %%00010%%00010This version of metanode is available under the GNU GPL 3.0 License, unless stated otherwise. The full version of the license terms is available at https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.html. %%00010%%00010Version: 1.0.0 from 2023-11-09%%00010Contact person: Karolina Krystofova (karolina.krystofova@ceitec.muni.cz) %%00010More information can be found at https://github.com/OmicsWorkflows/KNIME_metanodes%%00010%%00010
Data table containing columns with transformed and normalized data without NA values
Data table containing columns with batch corrected values
Bar plot of sources of data variability before and after batch correction
Pie chart of sources of data variability before and after batch correction
UMAP projection of data table columns before and after batch correction
